name: Automaton (ClintonThai)
description:
You wake up in a robotic body and come out of your capsule to notice strange objects around you. Repair boxes are found scattered on the floor, and you head out to escape a bunker filled with mutated life forms. The player’s goal in this level is to safely escape the bunker through the collection of keys and repair boxes to break through several doors. To achieve this goal, the player will first have to navigate the map and find all of the door keys to get through the level and collect the repair boxes to open up the final door. Starting at the beginning of the level, the player will be inside of its capsule.

Moving close to the first collectible (key), it will give the player access to the next room. By picking up door keys and repair boxes, they will have access to the next room. The player will notice spiked turtle shell creatures which should indicate that they are a threat to the player. The player will have to avoid the creatures while retrieving the items to get through the bunker. The player will be using the up, left, down, right keys and space bar to move and jump around. Some threats are unavoidable, so the player will have to spend their health points wisely.

Interactions are simple as jumping and walking.

Player Controls:

Arrow Keys for movement of the player

Space bar to jump

Mouse to turn rotate the camera
